Allow users to use role union, which mea: Allow users to use role union, which means they can use permissions from all their roles simultaneously, or switch between individual roles.
Do not use role union. Users need to swi: Do not use role union. Users need to switch between their roles individually.
Force users to use only role union. They: Force users to use only role union. They cannot switch between individual roles.
